snippet: Two researchers discovered ways to make your profile stand out. One of them proved just how well they worked.
abstract: Dr Sameer Chaudhry and Dr Khalid Khan study in journal Evidence Based Medicine concludes that most successful profiles on dating websites present content divided into 70 percent personal information and 30 percent description of ideal partner.
lead_paragraph: Two researchers discovered ways to make your profile stand out. One of them proved just how well they worked.
